name: Puguette - A Fully 3D-Printed Quadruped Robot
description: Puguette is a fully 3D-printed quadruped robot. By sharing model data and code, robot development can be achieved relatively easily. The main objective was to develop actuators at a low cost, inspired by OpenTorque.
